author: niallp
msg: Port LANG-523 to 2.x branch - Performance improvement to StrBuilder by doubling the size of the String in ensureCapacity. Tests indicate a hundredhold improvement in appending speed, which seems worth the doubling of data size.

author: niallp
msg: Port LANG-422 to 2.x branch - add appendSeparator() methods with an alternative default separator if the StrBuilder is currently empty
